title: Mindrover.LinuxGame.Iso-Trice
description:
Title: Mindrover
Developer: Linux Game Publishing
Genre: Puzzle
Release Date: Nov,1999
Supplier: GodFearMe
Patcher: Dabian & GodFearMe
Supply Date: Mar,2007
Patched: 'setup.sh' has been modified since it wouldn't work when testing it on Ubuntu. Also some files in ./bin/x86/glibc-2.1/ was duplicated and put in ./bin/x86/
Rar Count: 4 x 15MB

Game information:
Mindrover is a challenging puzzle game where you build a robot and guide it through a variety of challenges, including races, battles, and sports.

Minimum Requirements:
Operating System: 2.2.x or better Linux kernel with glibc-2.x and X-Windows
Processor: 200 MHz x86 Processor
Memory: 100 MB
Disc Space: 70 MB
Graphics Card: Hardware Accelerated 3D Graphics card with 8 MB video memory
Sound Card: OSS Compatible

For review,screenshots etc: http://www.tuxgames.com/details.cgi?&gameref=49

Install Notes:
Unpack
Mount or burn the ISO
'sh setup.sh' (or try hacked.setup.sh if you get error message about glibc) 
'mindrover' to play
